text: A cana was a unit of length used in the former Crown of Aragon. The exact meaning was not consistent, but the use in Barcelona was a distance of . It is around the same value as the vara of Aragon, a seldom used Spanish and Portuguese unit of length. ==See also== * List of obsolete units of measurement * Portuguese customary units * Spanish customary units ==References== Category:Obsolete units of measurement Category:Units of length
title: Cana (unit)
